Objects

A few examples of using object to create things

An object has properties (written as name:value pairs) and can make use of methods. Multiple objects can have same properties with different values and can use the same methods in different orders.

Things to note

  • object has been created with existing properties and values
  • Multiple methods are included for altering the values within the object

The object

A very basic object for some box information
const cubeObject = {
  width:50,
  length:50,
  height:50,
  name:"Box",
  color:"black",
  changeColor: function(color){
    this['color'] = color;
  },
  changeSize: function(size){
    this['width'] = size;
    this['length'] = size;
    this['height'] = size;
  }
};

Grabbing the data

Pull in the data from the object and then use it to build a box (should be seen on the right)
